  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111957</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111957</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Bralna hišica</string>
            <string language="en">Reading house</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesehaus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maison de lecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Casa da leitura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Casa della lettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σπίτι ανάγνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Casa de la lectura</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci, ki imajo težave z branjem, odnesejo bralno hišico domov, starše pa obvestimo o načinu dela. Hišica je dobra motivacija za branje, učencem pa lahko ob zapolnjeni hišici v zvezek damo nalepko (npr. čebelico) ali štampiljko ter napišemo kratko spodbudno oz. pohvalno sporočilo (npr. v oblačku - kot da čebelica govori).</string>
            <string language="en">Tool that can be used with students that have reading problems to encourage them to read more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">branje</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razumevanje</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">utrjevanje</string>
            <string language="en">drill</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vaja</string>
            <string language="en">exercise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bearbeiten Sie, das mit Kursteilnehmern verwendet 
werden kann, die die Leseprobleme haben, zum sie anzuregen, mehr zu 
lesen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usinez qui peut être utilisé avec les étudiants
qui ont des problèmes de lecture pour les encourager à lire plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dirija que pode ser usado com estudantes que têm 
os problemas da leitura para os incentivar ler mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lavori che può essere usato con gli allievi che 
hanno problemi della lettura per consigliare loro leggere più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργαλείο που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί με τους 
σπουδαστές που έχουν τα προβλήματα ανάγνωσης για να τα 
ενθαρρύνουν για να διαβάσουν περισσότερους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Filetee que se puede utilizar con los estudiantes 
que tienen problemas de la lectura para animarles a que lean más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bohrgerät</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exercice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">broca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exercício</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
